mapper.delete: delete from tb_caas_phonenumber where id in (${str});
mapper.select: select t.* from tb_caas_phonenumber t where t.id =#{id} limit 1
select t.* from tb_caas_phonenumber t where t.phoneNumber =#{phoneNumber} limit 1
select * from tb_caas_fee t where t.id = #{rateId}
select * from tb_caas_fee t where t.productType=#{productType} and t.rateType='0'
mapper.update: update tb_caas_number_apply t set t.applyCount = t.applyCount + #{applyCount}, t.status='1' where t.id = #{id};

update tb_caas_phonenumber t set t.allotStatus='1', t.userName=#{userName}, t.userId=#{userId}, t.productType = #{productType}, t.rateId = #{rateId}, t.ratisUnit = #{ratisUnit}, t.employUnit = 0, t.reSidueUnit = #{ratisUnit} where t.id = #{mobileId}
mapper.select: select t.*, m.userName, n.gratisUnit as ratisUnit from tb_caas_number_apply t left join tb_caas_user m on t.userId = m.userId left join tb_caas_fee n on t.rateId = n.id where t.id = #{id}
select city_id as cityId, city_name as cityName from tb_caas_city
select t.*, m.userName from tb_caas_number_apply t left join tb_caas_user m on t.userId = m.userId where t.id = #{id}
select status from tb_caas_authentication where userId=#{userId};
